# Instructions for requesting a reference letter:

### 1. Make sure you ask me ideally a month in advance of the due date (2 week minimum for rush requests)
### 2. I only provide letters that you have waived the right to see
### 3. Please use [THIS FORM](https://forms.gle/bRMSxdKVw6RiVhRCA) to request a letter
### 4. [Send me a note](mailto:gzahn@uvu.edu) via Email or Teams to let me know you've requested a letter with the form (to make sure I don't miss a notification)
